content: fruit hammock created by adriana baiocco size approx 21 long without rings x 13 75 width level easy intermediate 1 e g a p respect the authors/designers right this pattern is property of adriana r baiocco you cannot modify resell use my videos my pictures or share my pattern all finished designs made with this pattern can be sold but please i would appreciate it if you could respectfully give me credit/shares for the pattern ig@adrianabeachboard adrianabaiocco@ravelry material circulo yarns apolo eco 8 worsted 156 m/171 yds 200g/7 oz 1 ball in #8001 white crochet hook 5 mm/h 2 plastic rings 2 diameter 2 metal hooks to hold hammock under cabinets as shown in the picture scissors and tapestry needle stitch glossary and abbreviations stitch st make mk skip skip chain chain slip st slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet elongated double_crochet edc yarn over pull through the chain 3 loops on the hook yarn over pull through 1 loop 3 loops remain on the hook yarn over pull through 2 loops yarn over pull through the last 2 loops v-st 1 double_crochet chain 3 1 double_crochet in the same base st shell st 3 edc chain 3 3 edc in the same base st end of row/round eor this is an easy project that can be finished in an hour with no sewing necessary length can be adapted to the size you want i use this elongated double_crochet see glossary st but you can use treble_crochet too 2 e g a p respect the authors/designers right this pattern is property of adriana r baiocco you cannot modify resell use my videos my pictures or share my pattern all finished designs made with this pattern can be sold but please i would appreciate it if you could respectfully give me credit/shares for the pattern ig@adrianabeachboard adrianabaiocco@ravelry hammock crochet back and forth chain 3 to start row are counted as 1 double_crochet cover ring with 9 single_crochet turn r1 chain 35 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet 8x chain 15 = 8 loops + 15 chains turn r2 1 single_crochet into first chain loop chain 3 + 2 edc see glossary into the same loop 1 shell st see glossary in the next 6 chain loops end with 3 edc into last loop turn 3 e g a p respect the authors/designers right this pattern is property of adriana r baiocco you cannot modify resell use my videos my pictures or share my pattern all finished designs made with this pattern can be sold but please i would appreciate it if you could respectfully give me credit/shares for the pattern ig@adrianabeachboard adrianabaiocco@ravelry r3 chain 3 2 edc 1 v-st see glossary in each shell chain space chain 3 6x end with 3 edc r4 chain 3 2 edc 1 shell st into v-st chain space 6x end with 3 edc r5 r14 repeat r3 and r4 for more 10 row approx 12 = pattern without chain loops x 13 75 width note you can make
